type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Resource Transfer

---



[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer).

Transfers a value from a "provider" resource into a resource.

Type ID: `apugli:resource_transfer`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Resource Transfer

---



[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer).

Transfers a value from a "provider" resource into a resource.

Type ID: `apugli:resource_transfer`



---

resource.description: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Resource (Power Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer) or has a built-in cooldown to transfer the value from `provider` into.
resource.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Resource (Power Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer) or has a built-in cooldown to transfer the value from `provider` into.

provider.description: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Resource (Power Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer) or has a built-in cooldown to use for the value transfer.
provider.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Resource (Power Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/resource_transfer) or has a built-in cooldown to use for the value transfer.
